SERVICE_IDENTIFICATION_ABSTRACT.default: 52North Sensor Observation Service - Data Access for the Sensor Web
SERVICE_IDENTIFICATION_ABSTRACT.title: SOS Abstract

SERVICE_IDENTIFICATION_FILE.title: Service Identification File
SERVICE_IDENTIFICATION_FILE.description: The path to a file containing an ows:ServiceIdentification overriding the above settings. It can be either an absolute path (like /home/user/sosconfig/identification.xml) or a path relative to the web application directory (e.g. WEB-INF/identification.xml).

SERVICE_PROVIDER_INDIVIDUAL_NAME.title: Responsible Person
SERVICE_PROVIDER_INDIVIDUAL_NAME.description: The name of the responsible person of this service.

SERVICE_PROVIDER_POSITION_NAME.title: Position
SERVICE_PROVIDER_POSITION_NAME.description: The position of the responsible person.

SERVICE_PROVIDER_PHONE.title: Phone
SERVICE_PROVIDER_PHONE.description: The phone number of the responsible person.

SERVICE_PROVIDER_ADDRESS.title: Address
SERVICE_PROVIDER_ADDRESS.description: The street address of the responsible person.

SERVICE_PROVIDER_CITY.title: City
SERVICE_PROVIDER_CITY.description: The city of the responsible person.

SERVICE_PROVIDER_ZIP.title: Postal Code
SERVICE_PROVIDER_ZIP.description: The postal code of the responsible person.

SERVICE_PROVIDER_STATE.title: State
SERVICE_PROVIDER_STATE.description: The state of the responsible person.

SERVICE_PROVIDER_COUNTRY.title: Country
SERVICE_PROVIDER_COUNTRY.description: The country of the responsible person.

SERVICE_PROVIDER_EMAIL.title: Mail-Address
SERVICE_PROVIDER_EMAIL.description: The electronic mail address of the responsible person.

SERVICE_PROVIDER_FILE.title: Service Provider File
SERVICE_PROVIDER_FILE.description: The path to a file containing an ows:ServiceProvider overriding the above settings. It can be either an absolute path (like /home/user/sosconfig/provider.xml) or a path relative to the web application directory (e.g. WEB-INF/provider.xml).

SOS_URL.title: SOS URL
SOS_URL.description: The endpoint URL of this sos which will be shown in the GetCapabilities response (e.g. http://localhost:8080/52nSOS/sos). The path to a specific binding (like /soap) will appended to this URL.

SKIP_DUPLICATE_OBSERVATIONS.title: Skip duplicate observations
SKIP_DUPLICATE_OBSERVATIONS.description: Skip duplicate observations silently when inserted by batch.

FOI_ENCODED_IN_OBSERVATION.title: FOI encoded in observation
FOI_ENCODED_IN_OBSERVATION.description: Encode the complete FOI instance within an Observation instance instead of just the FOI id.

FOI_LISTED_IN_OFFERINGS.title: FOI in offerings
FOI_LISTED_IN_OFFERINGS.description: Include list of FOI IDs in offerings.

SHOW_FULL_OPERATIONS_METADATA.title: Show full operations metadata
SHOW_FULL_OPERATIONS_METADATA.description: Include allowed values in OperationMetadata of GetCapabilities response.

SHOW_FULL_OPERATIONS_METADATA_FOR_OBSERV.title: Show full operations metadata for observations
SHOW_FULL_OPERATIONS_METADATA_FOR_OBSERV.description: Include allowed values for featureOfInterest in OperationMetadata of GetObservation.

CHILD_PROCEDURES_ENCODED_IN_PARENTS_DESC.title: Encode child procedures.
CHILD_PROCEDURES_ENCODED_IN_PARENTS_DESC.description: Encode the complete sensor description of a child procedure in the parent procedure description.

LEASE.title: Lease
LEASE.description: Time of lease for result template in GetResult operation in minutes.

MAX_GET_OBSERVATION_RESULTS.title: Maximum number of observations
MAX_GET_OBSERVATION_RESULTS.description: Maximum number of observation in GetObservation responses. Set to 0 (zero) for unlimited number of observations.

CAPABILITIES_CACHE_UPDATE_INTERVAL.title: Capabilities cache update interval
CAPABILITIES_CACHE_UPDATE_INTERVAL.description: The update interval of the capabilities cache in minutes.

MINIMUM_GZIP_SIZE.title: GZIP Threshold
MINIMUM_GZIP_SIZE.description: The size (in byte) the SOS starts to gzip responses (if the client supports it).

DEFAULT_EPSG.title: Default EPSG Code
DEFAULT_EPSG.description: The EPSG code in which the geometries are stored.

SENSOR_DIRECTORY.title: Sensor Directory
SENSOR_DIRECTORY.description: The path to a directory with the sensor descriptions in SensorML format. It can be either an absolute path (like /home/user/sosconfig/sensors) or a path relative to the web application directory (e.g. WEB-INF/sensors).

CONFIGURATION_FILES.title: Configuration Files
CONFIGURATION_FILES.description: Configuration files and their file identifier (List: IDENTIFIER FILENAME;IDENTIFIER2 FILENAME2; ...).

CACHE_THREAD_COUNT.title: Cache Feeder Threads
CACHE_THREAD_COUNT.description: The number of threads used to fill the capabilities cache.

TOKEN_SEPERATOR.title: Token separator
TOKEN_SEPERATOR.description: Token separator in result element (a character)

TUPLE_SEPERATOR.title: Tuple separator
TUPLE_SEPERATOR.description: Tuple separator in result element (a character)

DECIMAL_SEPARATOR.title: Decimal separator
DECIMAL_SEPARATOR.description: Decimal separator in result element (a character)

GML_DATE_FORMAT.title: Date format of GML
GML_DATE_FORMAT.description: Date format of Geography Markup Language

SRS_NAME_PREFIX_SOS_V1.title: SOSv1 SRS Prefix
SRS_NAME_PREFIX_SOS_V1.description: Prefix for the SRS name in SOS v1.0.0.

SRS_NAME_PREFIX_SOS_V2.title: SOSv2 SRS Prefix
SRS_NAME_PREFIX_SOS_V2.description: Prefix for the SRS name in SOS v2.0.0.

DEFAULT_OFFERING_PREFIX.title: Default Offering Prefix
DEFAULT_OFFERING_PREFIX.description: The default prefix for generated offerings (if not defined in RegisterSensor requests).

DEFAULT_PROCEDURE_PREFIX.title: Default Procedure Prefix
DEFAULT_PROCEDURE_PREFIX.description: The default prefix for generated procedures (if not defined in RegisterSensor requests).

CHARACTER_ENCODING.title: Character Encoding
CHARACTER_ENCODING.description: The character encoding used for responses.

SWITCH_COORDINATES_FOR_EPSG_CODES.title: EPSG Codes with Switched Coordinates
SWITCH_COORDINATES_FOR_EPSG_CODES.description: A list of all EPSG codes for which the SOS has to switch coordinate order, for example from lat/lon to lon/lat, or from x/y to y/x.
